original_text: Jesus said to them, ‘Elijah does come first. He makes everything ready. But what is written in the Bible about the Son of Man? It says that people will cause him to suffer a lot. They will think that he is nothing.
korean_text: 이르시되 엘리야가 과연 먼저 와서 모든 것을 회복하거니와 어찌 인자에 대하여 기록하기를 많은 고난을 받고 멸시를 당하리라 하였느냐

sentences.original_text: But what is written in the Bible
It says that people will cause him to suffer a lot.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그를 많이 고통받게 할 것이라고 말한다.

sentences.original_text: They will think that he is nothing.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 아무것도 아니라고 여길 것이다.'
